review: "Prosa del Observatorio" by Julio Cortázar is a beautifully crafted piece that blends poetic prose with philosophical musings. The imagery and the flow of the text create a mesmerizing atmosphere, drawing the reader into a world of contemplation and wonder. While it may not be as accessible as some of Cortázar's other works, it is a rewarding read for those who appreciate a more meditative and reflective style.
